reference_a:
@article{westhoff2024,
  title = {Psychological flexibility and cognitive-affective processes in young adults’ daily lives},
  author = {Westhoff, Marlon and Heshmati, Saida and Siepe, Björn S. and Vogelbacher, Christoph and Ciarrochi, Joseph and Hayes, Steven C. and Hofmann, Stefan G.},
  date = {2024-04-08},
  journaltitle = {Scientific Reports},
  shortjournal = {Sci Rep},
  volume = {14},
  number = {1},
  pages = {8182},
  publisher = {Nature Publishing Group},
  doi = {10.1038/s41598-024-58598-3}
}
additional_comments: item coding based on private codebook

features.name: finished
features.coding:
0 = no
1 = yes

features.name: pbat_1
features.coding:
I am not finding an appropriate outlet for my emotions.
0 = fully disagree
100 = fully agree

features.name: pbat_2
features.coding:
I am able to experience a range of emotions appropriate to the moment. 
0 = fully disagree
100 = fully agree

features.name: pbat_3
features.coding:
My thinking is getting in the way of things that are important to me.
0 = fully disagree
100 = fully agree

features.name: pbat_4
features.coding:
I am using my thinking in ways that help me live better.
0 = fully disagree
100 = fully agree

features.name: pbat_5
features.coding:
I am struggling to connect with the present moment.
0 = fully disagree
100 = fully agree

features.name: pbat_6
features.coding:
I am paying attention to important things in my life.
0 = fully disagree
100 = fully agree

features.name: pbat_7
features.coding:
I am doing things that hurt my connection with people who are important to me.
0 = fully disagree
100 = fully agree

features.name: pbat_8
features.coding:
I am doing things to connect with people who are important to me.
0 = fully disagree
100 = fully agree

features.name: pbat_9
features.coding:
I am doing things only because I am complying with what others want me to do.
0 = fully disagree
100 = fully agree

features.name: pbat_10
features.coding:
I am choosing to do things that are personally important to me.
0 = fully disagree
100 = fully agree

features.name: pbat_11
features.coding:
I am not finding a meaningful way to challenge myself.
0 = fully disagree
100 = fully agree

features.name: pbat_12
features.coding:
I am finding personally important ways to challenge myself.
0 = fully disagree
100 = fully agree

features.name: pbat_13
features.coding:
I am acting in ways that hurt my physical health.
0 = fully disagree
100 = fully agree

features.name: pbat_14
features.coding:
I am acting in ways that help my physical health.
0 = fully disagree
100 = fully agree

features.name: pbat_15
features.coding:
I am feeling stuck and unable to change my ineffective behavior.
0 = fully disagree
100 = fully agree

features.name: pbat_16
features.coding:
I am able to change my behavior, so that it helps my life.
0 = fully disagree
100 = fully agree

features.name: pbat_17
features.coding:
I am struggling to keep doing something that is good for me.
0 = fully disagree
100 = fully agree

features.name: pbat_18
features.coding:
I am sticking to strategies that seem to work.
0 = fully disagree
100 = fully agree

features.name: core_affect_valence
features.coding:
How do you feel right now?
0 = Very bad
100 = Very good

features.name: core_affect_arousal
features.coding:
How physically active do you feel right now?
0 = Not active
100 = Very active

features.name: life_satisfaction
features.coding:
In general, how satisfied are you with your life?
1 = Very Satisfied
4 = Very Dissatisfied

features.name: stopd_1
features.coding:
Feeling sad, down, or uninterested in life?
0 = fully disagree
100 = fully agree

features.name: stopd_2
features.coding:
Feeling anxious or nervous?
0 = fully disagree
100 = fully agree

features.name: stopd_3
features.coding:
Feeling stressed?
0 = fully disagree
100 = fully agree

features.name: stopd_4
features.coding:
Feeling angry?
0 = fully disagree
100 = fully agree

features.name: stopd_5
features.coding:
Not having the social support you feel you need?
0 = fully disagree
100 = fully agree

features.name: sleep_hour
features.coding: How many hours did you sleep last night?

features.name: sleep_quality
features.coding: How would you rate your sleep quality last night?
